n_welcome.text: Welcome to SOYL — Story Of Your Life. I can help you learn about our product, request a pilot, or find career opportunities. What would you like to do?

n_product_overview.text: SOYL provides multimodal emotion-aware agents — LLM-based sales agents that adapt their tone, suggestions and next actions based on real-time signals (voice, text, and visual) and business rules.

n_rnd_overview.text: SOYL R&D works through staged phases: MVP (signal capture + demo), Cognitive Signal Layer (fusion), Agentic Layer (policy & LLMs), Foundation Model, and Productization. We focus on privacy-preserving, on-device options and enterprise SDKs.

n_pricing.text: We offer Pilot, Startup, and Enterprise tiers. Pricing depends on scale, SLAs and privacy options. For a precise quote, contact sales.

n_careers.text: Open roles: AI Research Lead, ML Engineer, UX/AR Developer, Data Engineer, Ethics & Compliance Lead, Product Manager. Interested?

n_docs.text: We have SDK docs, API reference, and quickstarts. Where would you like to start?

n_usecases.text: Common use cases include: Retail AR commerce assistants, In-store kiosks, Remote sales assistants, Customer support triage, Healthcare patient engagement.

n_architecture.text: Architecture (brief): sensors → signal processors → Cognitive Signal Layer (fusion) → Emotion State Vector → Agent Module (LLM + policy) → Action connectors (API, CRM, POS).

n_rnd_phases.text: Phases: Phase 1 — MVP (3 months); Phase 2 — Signal Fusion (6 months); Phase 3 — Agentic Layer (9-12 months); Phase 4 — Foundation Model & productization (12-24 months).

n_rnd_collab.text: To discuss R&D partnerships, email rnd@soyl.ai or request a pilot.

n_pricing_table.text:
Example tiers:
1) Pilot — small proof-of-concept
2) Startup — limited scale SDK
3) Enterprise — SLA, on-prem/air-gapped.

n_apply_roles.text: To apply, send an email with your CV and portfolio to jobs@soyl.ai. Which role are you applying for?

n_quickstart.text: Quickstart: `npm install @soyl/sdk` → initialize with API key → call Emotion API. (Sample code is available in Docs.)

n_api_ref.text: API Reference summary: Emotion API (POST /v1/emotion), Agent API (POST /v1/agent/step).

n_request_pilot.text: Great — a pilot helps you validate value quickly. What kind of pilot are you interested in?

n_pilot_contact.text: Thanks — please provide your contact details (email & company) in the next step so our team can reach out. We will never sell your data.

n_feedback_thanks.text: Thanks for sharing! Someone from SOYL will contact you soon. Would you like to:

n_error_fallback.text: Sorry, I couldn't perform that action. Would you like to try something else or contact support?
